alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Dawson; Gaines; Martin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 4:46PM CDT until June 02 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Andrews County in western Texas... Southeastern Gaines County in western Texas... Martin County in western Texas... Southern Dawson County in western Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 445 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 18 miles southwest of Lamesa to 17 miles west of Lenorah to 14 miles east of Andrews to 18 miles east of Jal Airport, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Storm chaser reports 2 inch hail 8 miles south of Frankel City . IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Andrews, Ackerly, Lenorah, Tarzan, Sparenberg, Tenmile, Frankel City, Patricia, Klondike and Andrews County Airport. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for western Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for western Texas.
